pexels_api_usage.rate_limits: 200 requests per hour for free tier
pexels_api_usage.size: large or original for best quality
pexels_api_usage.caching: Cache results for 24 hours to minimize API calls

image_selection_criteria.relevance: Must match addon category and Australian 4WD tour context
image_selection_criteria.licensing: Pexels free license - attribution appreciated but not required
image_selection_criteria.context: Prefer Australian locations or similar coastal/beach environments
image_selection_criteria.composition: Avoid cluttered images, prefer clean hero shots

fallback_strategy.secondary: If insufficient results, use fallback searches
fallback_strategy.placeholder: Use generic category placeholder if all searches fail

seo_optimization.alt_text: Use provided templates with specific location keywords
seo_optimization.image_title: Combine title + location for image title attribute
seo_optimization.structured_data: Implement ImageObject schema for all addon images

performance.format: Convert to WebP for 60-70% size reduction
performance.cdn: Serve from CDN for optimal delivery
